metadata.title: CVE-2018-20174 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Readin the function ui_clip_handle_data() that results in an information leak.

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
